ol.title: To set your date and time format:

li.p: In the My Preferences menu group, click Date and Time (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.
The Date and Time Preferences window appears.

ol.li: Select your Time Zone from the drop-down list. The correct time for this time zone appears in the Date column of your mail folders.
Select the Date Format you want.
Select the Time Format you want.
Select the order for the Date and Time you want.
Click Save. The window refreshes with a message informing you that your changes have been saved.
